name: The Grassy Knoll
desc: A small an open grassy hill.  A small house is visible to the south.

looks.name: house
looks.desc: The house is fairly long and thin.

name: Behind the Grassy Knoll
desc: A small an open grassy hill rises to the west and a long small house is visible to the south.  The soft murmuring sounds of a small city come from somewhere to the east.  The open grasses seem to wrap the small hill.

name: A Small Grassy Field near a Broken Down Wall.
desc: A small an open grassy hill rises to the south west and the remains of a stone wall are visible to the east.  From somewhere to the east, the soft murmurs of a city drift in..

name: Small Grasses Near a Hill
desc: A small an open grassy hill rises to the south and the peaked roof of a small house is visible beyond it to the south.  The soft murmuring sounds of a small city come from somewhere to the east.  The open grasses seem to wrap the small hill.

name: A Small Dark Garden
desc: A small an open grassy hill rises to the south and the peaked roof of a small house is visible beyond it to the south.  The soft murmuring sounds of a small city come from somewhere to the east.  The open grasses seem to wrap the small hill.
